div.head: the pure circle of three bodily domains
div.p:
ndah nihan varahakna mami rumuhun ri saṅ sevaka dharma katkan kita rumәṅәkna kavivekankaviven saṅ hyaṅ dharma, mvaṅ kabyavasthānikaṅkabyaṁvasṭanikaṁkabyavas·tanika saṅ hyaṅ ajñāna, hana trikāyamaṇḍalatrikaya man·dalatrakayamandala pariśuddha, ṅaṅaranya, inujarakәn saṅ pandita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ya pantahan kvekikvakikvakiṅ ulah śabda lavan ambәk, yan kvayekvayekvaṁ hana ma
līnamalina:maṁline ri hr̥dayantapr̥ḍayantaprǝdayan·ta, ya teka prahprǝh pәgәṅәn rakṣa pahayu juga ya, apan hetuniṅhentaniṁhentuniṁ manәmvakәnmanimvakәn śukhadukha halahayu,

yan pinahala ulahta, śabdata, ambәktaAmbhǝktaAmbhakta, niyata kapaṅguhnikaṅkapaguḥnikaṁ hala denta yan maṅkana, yan pinahayu ulahta,
śabdata, ambәkta, avas kapaṅguhnikaṅ hayuta yan maṅkana, mataṅyan hana paribhāṣa kumva ṅ madyus-dyusḍyas·ḍyas· vvay tinәmunya kasvabhāvaniṅkasvambhavaniṁ janma, hala tumәmu halanya, hayu tumәmu hayunya, maṅkana lvirniṅlvarniṁ janma,

ndya ḍr̥ṣṭānta, i riki dadyanya, hala deniṅ halanya, hayu deniṅ hayunya, nihan upadyanta hana ya maṇik anargha, ṅa, tan kinavruhankinavraḥhan· mulyanya, tan paprameya ri rahayu, kaliṅanya ikaṅ maṇik anargha, lavan maṇik sarveṣṭaṣavesṭaṭāṣavesṭa, yvagya karikāpusәn karita ri gaṅsa, tambaga lavan timah, aparan ta yvagyanika, niyatār
mijil śrīnika lavan dhanuhnika, maṅka pva yvagyagyapa paṅapusan ta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikәtan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭaṣavesṭa,
nihan liṅnira ri saṅ hyaṅ śāstra

p.foreign: lpas ca vuṁkunuṁ ceva, aḍika udika tatte tatur tathya tuṅgәṁ, ta deva nigaḍyate

div.p:
apan sinaṅguh rambut lәpas, ṅa, vulu pasagi, ṅa, hana uḍika, hana tater, hana sorasa, ṅa, ika ta kabaih yvagya karika paṅapusan ta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikәtan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭaṣavesṭa, taham pih yāpusәn ta ri gaṅsa tambaga lavan timah, aparan ta yvagyanika, paṅapusan ta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikә
tan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭa, nahan liṅnya ri saṅ hyaṅ śāstra, lpәs ca vuṁkunuṁ cevacova, Aḍi Ikaṁ, Uḍi Ika:, tate:r tatur tatya tuṅgәṅ nu yvagyanika

hana ya mas kanaka santaṅvaṅ, ṅa, mas kanaka jātirūpa, sakati mulyanya, vrǝttyavrǝt inapisan pituṅ apitu, matәmahan ta ya satahil i vatuvasta bratnyabranya, ndya ya teka tuṅgәṅ, tan limbaklibaklimbhak tan lǝgәlǝgǝṁ, an inapi muvah, apan samaṅkana juga, pinakadadiniṅpinaḥkaḍaḍiniṁpinakaḍiniṁ mas kabaih, ndah ya teka yvagya rahayu paṅapusan ta irikaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikәtan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭaṣavesṭa,

ya ta kapusan deni gaṅsanaṁsa ta
mbaga lavan timah
, tar mijil śrīnika lavan dhanuhnika, aparanparan tar yuktinikauk·tinika, salah nija salah karma, salah svara, bhava ṅaranika, iva maṅkana ta saṅ hyaṅ dharma viśeṣa, sira maṇik anargha, ṅuniveh avakta yeka manik sarveṣṭa ṅaranya, ndah ta yāṅkәn gaṅsa tambaga lavan timah ika tan yvagya rakәtaknara:kǝn·takǝna iri
kaṅ maṇik anargha, paṅikәtan ta irikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭa,

nihan ya ulah mahala, śabda tar yukti, ambǝkAmbhǝkAmbhak magәlәh ri kapva kaṅṭā janma, ṅuniveh ri saṅ paṇḍita, kaliṅanya tan yvagya kari ulah mahala śabda tar yukti, ambǝk magәlәh, rasā
kәn i saṅ hyaṅ dharma, lavan arakṣari sari śarīranta, ṅuni
veh ri saṅ paṇḍita, taham asih tar yukti ika, punaruktanikaṅpunaḥruktaḥnikaṁpunaḥrutaḥnikaṁ kavvaṅanta, hilaṅ masihniṅ manakmavak maṅrabi, maṇik makadaṅ mvaṅ renantarenakta, ya tan vnaṅ rumakṣa ikaṅ ulah mahala śabda tar yukti ambǝk magәlәh ri kapva kaṅ janma, ṅuniveh ri saṅ sādhu, ndyanadyi yvagya paṅrakṣanta, ri śarīranta, yekayekvaṁ santaṅvaṅ liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, kanaka santaṅva ṅaranya
, ulah rahayu, śabda rahayu, ambәk rahayu, ya rakṣaknarakṣakǝnarasakǝn saṅ hyaṅ darma,

nihan mataṅyan trikāya maṇḍala pariśuddha ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, tri ṅaraniṅ tәlu, śuddha ta ya trikāyatrikayatrakaya maṇḍalam, ityuktamItyatǝmItikyatǝm, nahannihan trikāyatrikayatrakaya liṅ saṅ paṇḍita,

nihanniha tambaynyatǝmbǝynyatǝmbhǝy·nya sih saṅ paṇḍita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, pariśuddha ta ri ambәkAmbhǝka rahayu, usǝnUsin hayva kasәlapan ambәk magәlәh, nirmalaṁ hr̥dayamradayǝmhradayǝm citam, ndah pahaliṅlaṅ kaṅtaṁ manah pvāmbǝkpvambhikpva ma:bǝk tiṅәt maṅaṅәn-aṅәn, prihәn bhikṣālakṣanambhǝkṣalakṣanǝm.

nihan lakṣaṇanta viku, hayva tr̥ṣṇa ri hulun juga, byakta taṅ rambut pinәgatanya tanta pәgati, tan kavighātakavigataḥkivigata malaṅ kva hana, ya tika pariśuddha timpalaknatimpalakǝnkantimpalakǝna kuna rǝtakna, ya ta mas r̥kr̥t masәkar vañva, ṅa, maṅkana ta kita maseva
ka di saṅ paṇḍita, hayva ta kita gumavayakna gurutalpaka, jagat upadrava, katakutakathakutan· ri sira, bhaktyānukul ta kita ri saṅ guru, gavayakna kasupraṇatakasuprana, di* saṅ guru, tǝka ri saṅ paṇḍita, dataṅ ta ri kasādhyanya,

maṅkana ta kita hulun ri saṅ paṇḍita, ṅuniveh saṅ prabhu, tar gavayakna prabhu drohakadvahak·dvahaka, dәṇḍana vinigrahadǝndana vinigrahadǝndan avigraha katakuta ri sira, marapvan ta kita na kajvalkajvala pati biṣama, bhaktya ta kita ri prabhu, mataṅyan tәka ri kasādhyanyakadaḍyanyakasanḍyanya, maṅkanamakana ta kita rāma, kalaṅ, gusti, patih ri banva, kunaṅ dharma tulājñānaniṅ kadi kita, hayva ta kita ti
mpaṅ svara ri byavahāra, tan paṅivakǝn tәṅәnpaṅivakǝ tǝṅǝnpaṅivakǝn tǝṅǝ ri guṇadosa, tar yukti purihniṅ vvaṅ atuha, ujar saṅ hyaṅ āgama, hayva tutaknanta, ya ta mataṅyan tar katǝkan trikāyamaṇḍalam cittamtr̥kaya mandalәm citәm·, nihan saṅ hyaṅ trikāya maṇḍala pariśuddha, ṅa, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma, ya tәmbәynya sih saṅ paṇḍita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma,

div.head: Second teacher's love: daśaśīla
div.p: ika hana kapindva asihsih saṅ paṇḍita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ya daśaśīla, ṅa, ndya ya nihan, śrotrasvaṭāThe list of ten organs is based on L 642, L 633 contains a different enumeration, i.e., svaṭā, tǝvǝk, cakṣuḥ, jihva, grana, vak, pani, pada, payu, pastra. This implies to the different order on their explanations. Despite the order, both mss. generaly share the same readings, so the variant are recorded in the apparatus., cakṣuh, ghrāṇa, jihva, vāk, tvak, pāṇi, pāyūpasthapayu:pasṭapayu, pas·tra, pāda, iniThe ms.633 and ms642 have the same reading on this word. This word is not attested in OJ, but common in OS. I consider it as OS intervention.* rǝṅәkna saṅ sevaka dharma,

śrotrasvaṭā ṅaraniṅ taliṅa, apa viṣayaniṅ taliṅa
, pinakadvāraniṅpinakaḍvaraniṁpinadvaraniṁ maṅrǝṅә ikaṅ śabda hala hayu, maṅrǝṅәṅǝ kita śabda manis arumhuma:sa:rum· enak manahta, maṅrǝṅәṅa pva kita śabda mahala, sәsәksǝsǝsakṣak ta kahiḍǝpantakana hdap·tan ahidǝpǝn· doṣanika, tan piniṇḍvakәnpaniḍakәnpaniḍvakǝn kārya hayu ri saṅ guru, ya ta kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma, tuli maṅrǝṅә aji saṅsa viku,

cakṣuh ṅaraniṅ mata, apa visayaniṅ mata, anon hala hayu, aveh sukhaduhkha, yar apayar napaya yan apa apa ikaI aveh sukhasuka duka, pinakapanonta ri ulah rahayu laṅsar kita denya, yan apa ika avehpaveḥ duhkha, mulata mas ri paḍanya janma len saka rika, lumakulumakva ta kita mareṅ sabhānsabaAn·, anonAnvananna ma
ra kita vvaṅvva cheda, vuḍug, tugәl, tәlihәntilihǝn·, buḍaya, tikәl, kәjәṅ, kәkәṅ, salvirniṅ virūpabiparupabimarupa haneṅhane rat, ṅuniveh buta tulīniṅtuli:ni panvan paṅrǝṅə̄, hayva seḍa kunaṅ kita yankita yayan kita anvan vvaṅ chedakṣara, hayva ta kita maṅkana, caṇḍaparihāracәndaparihara ṅaranya, apan tar kinavruhan ikaṅ nijakarmanajakamaḥ, ṅuniveh vvaṅ duhkha denika, ya ta kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma.

grhāṇa ṅaraniṅ iruṅ, apa viṣayaniṅ iruṅ, pinakapaṅambuṅ ta gandha surabhi, asurabhi, asādhāraṇaAsadarana, surabhisurabiAsurabi ṅaranya vaṅi, asurabhi ṅaranyaṅa abva lavan hapәk, asādhāraṇa ṅaranya haṅit*, mataṅ yan tritras pabhedaniṅ ga
ndha, aṅambuṅ pvasve kita gandha vaṅi, enak manahta, aṅambuṅ pvapve kita abvaAboAmbva hapәk tar enak manahta, ya mǝtumta krodhanta, ya saṅkansakantha mǝtumta śabda tar yuktisabda thar yuktisabḍa tan· yuk·ti Ambhǝk· magǝL̥ḥ, tan karasa ikaṅ trikāyatrikayatrakaya paramārtha, ya mataṅ yan prihәn kayatnakna ikaṅ viṣayaniṅ iruṅ, de saṅ sevaka dharma.

jihva ṅaraniṅ lidah, apa viṣayaniṅ lidah, pinakapaṅrasanikaṅ ṣaḍrasa, ṅa, lavaṇa kaṭuka, tikta, amla, kaṣāya, madhura, ya sinaṅguh ṣaḍrasa, ṅa, lavaṇa hasin, kaṭuka lada, tikta pahit, amla hasәm, kaṣāya vuduk, madhura manis, nahan sinaṅguh ṣaḍrasa, ṅa, kabu[A7v]kti kunaṅ ika denta jәnәka ri sakita denya, hayva ta kita maṅkana, tәka kasādhyan deniṅ viṣayanya, ya ta ketu tumiṅgalakna kārya hayu ri saṅ guru, tan karasa ikaṅ trikāya maṇḍala pariśuddha, yar maṅkana.

vak ṅaraniṅ śabda, apa viṣayaniṅ śabda, tar tutakna sakojarta, vak pāruṣya capala asta, rika durbala masukәt, tar paṅinakәn ri lvakapara, kunaṅ ujaranta, śabda manis arum vulat manohara, salvirniṅ maṅdadyakәn kaviratyanya, mvaṅ karǝṅә deniṅ lvakapara, maṅkana ta kita rumakṣa śabda.

tvak ṅaraniṅ ku
lit, apa viṣayaniṅ kulit, ṅarasa ṅahdap panas tis, ikaṅ maṅkana, kaliṅanya, ya prah pәgәṅәn juga ikaṅ viṣaya mijil saka ri kulit.

pāṇi ṅaraniṅ taṅan, apa viṣayaniṅ taṅan, masaṅguliniṅ taṅan, matalaṅkup yan paṅucap lavan saṅ guru, mvaṅ tan pasalaṅgapan tuṅgal lāvan saṅ guru, ṅuniveh tan panuduh asta mukha saṅ guru, tan pacumbana ya gamlәn taḍahәn saṅ guru, atava tan paṅalap drabya hyaṅ saṅ guru, ṅuniveh ri rat kabaih, kaliṅanya, hayva palar cidra yar hana kahyunya, hana sipat ri aji saṅ viku, nihan deyanta rumakṣa ta
ṅan.

pāyu ṅaraniṅ lәt, apa viṣayaniṅ lәt, utǝr saṅgāṅisiṅ maṅhәtut deyanta rumakṣa silit, tan pahәtut ri harǝpәn saṅ gurujana tan paharǝpan vvaṅ yan aṅisiṅ, tar kinvan de saṅ guru, mvaṅ saṅ paramābhyāgata kabaih, nihan deyanta rumakṣa silit.

upastha ṅaraniṅ pәlat, apa viṣayaniṅ pәlat, ānanda aṅәyәḥ kaliṅanya, tan paharǝpakna vvaṅ maṅәyәh ṅuniveh para sujanma lanaṅ vadvan hulun hadyan kaniṣṭha, madhyamvattama, apan agәṅ marurucanya, mǝtu papaniṅ dadi vvaṅ, apa pinakapāpanya, anvan mara kita vvaṅ dinval doṣanya ta, strisaṅgrahanya, mitradrvaha, gurudrvaha muṅpaṅ rabi laraṅan, aglis āvak siki tar na hayu, yan maṅkana.

pāda ṅaraniṅ suku, apa visayaniṅ suku, lumaku hasiṅ saparanta, yar maṅalvar maṅiḍul, maṅulvan maṅetan, atava anrap ta sila, kunaṅ deyanta maṅrakṣa suku, tan paḍәḍәlan, tan paṅraṅkakan tan pamaṅga-maṅgahan, tan pamire-mire, tan paluṇḍu, tan paḍvaṅdaṅ ri harǝpәn saṅ guru, ri paramābhyāgata kabaih, nihan ta rumakṣa suku, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka darma

div.head: Third teacher's love: Five Instructions
div.p:
nihan ta kapintiganya sih saṅ paṇḍita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ni
han pañcaśikṣā, ṅa, ndya ya nihan,

lg.l: apramādaś ca pañca vaite niyamāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

div.p:
akrodho, ṅa, tar dadi ika saṅ sevaka dharma, mentonakәna krvadhanya i harǝpәn saṅ guru, ṅuniveh i para sujanma kabaih, guruśuśruṣā ṅaranya, bakty anukul ta kita ri saṅ guru, tar madvah ri suku saṅ matuha, tuhu maṅkana yar hana pakvan saṅ guru, pariśuddha ta kunaṅ, kayatnakna ta ṅ trikāya paramārtha, ya ulah rahayu, śabda rahayu, ambәk rahayu, advah parǝk kayatnakna ikaṅ trikāya maṇḍala
pariśuddha mvaṅ daśaśīla, pañcaśikṣā, nihan kaśuśrūṣāniṅ maṅguru ṅaranya, śauca masihan taṅan, yan gamǝlәn taḍahәn saṅ guru, ṅuniveh drabya hyaṅ saṅ paṇḍita, āhāralāghava, śīghra ta kitānaḍah, agәṅ kәpәl kāmakara śīghrānaḍah, hayva ta kita maṅkana, ya kukṣi pura ṅaranya, umapa pva deniṅ manaḍah kaliṅanya, ya ta prāṇa sadhāraṇa juga upajīvaniṅ umaṅǝn-aṅәn saṅ hyaṅ hayu, nihan pañcaśikṣā, ṅa, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma.

div.head: Fourth teacher's love: Instructions of the Truth
div.p: nihan kapiṅpatnya sih saṅ paṇḍita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ini dharmaśikṣā ṅaranya, ndya ya nihan, ślokanya

lg.l: ālekhyam hasitam gītam jr̥mbhanam ca kaṇṭhāravāñ
śuddham ca phalarahasyam, na karotu gurumukhe

div.p:
naranya, ālekhyam, ṅa, hayvānurat-nurat lǝmah hayvānurat salǝ, ṅuniveh śarīranta, yan pasevaka ri saṅ guru, apan ya pinakavvaṅ sulakṣaṇa, agәlәm tumulis-tulis pupunya, yan paṅucap lavan saṅ guru, hasitam tan paguyvan-guyvan, ri harǝpәn saṅ guru, ṅuniveh abañvala, gītam tan paṅiduṅ, denya tan pamikvanvakәn kavijakṣaṇaan, yar tan kinvan de saṅ guru, jr̥mbhanam tan paṅucap lapā varǝg ri harǝpә
n saṅ guru, kaṇṭhāravam, tan paṅhvab, †akadanǝm† tan paṅulet ri harǝpәn saṅ guru, †sudәm† phalarahasyam tan paṅucap aṅkara ri harǝpәn saṅ guru, ṅuniveh mikvanvakәn namaniṅ mañal hila-hila maṅkana, na karotu gurumukhe ṅaranya, nihan kaliṅanya, tar magavayakna saṅ sevaka dharma.
nihan ta dharmaśikṣā ṅaranya,

lg.l: kr̥ma viduḥ ceva nervayude, Uddatayudena kaL̥m suparigrahaste

div.p:
ka, śalākāñjanam ta
n pacәlǝkan ri harǝpәn saṅ guru, ri harǝpәn istri laraṅan, suravile tan pakrala-krala yar paṅucap ṅuniveh yan pasila, tan lepana, tan pavәdakan, yar baturan saṅ guru, ṅuniveh mijil valaharnya panti asvāgata kunaṅ, dantagharsā, tan pasusur yan paṅucap lavan saṅ guru, adhyasta tar pahyasniṅ memen, agǝṇḍiṅ kecaka, hārahataḥ tan pavaja savilah, prayāsamāgama, tan padәlǝan lavan istri laraṅan, ṅuniveh istri saṅ guru, mava Ivak sama dagiṅ, tan paṅabhyāsa paṅan inum, ri harǝpәn saṅ guru, ya ika sinaṅguh dharmaśikṣā, ṅa, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma.

div.head: The Footsole of the Teacher
div.p: nihan kapiṅlimanya sih saṅ pandita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ndya ya, nihan,

ini guru talapakan pravakṣyāmi umucapan saṅ hyaṅ hayu, mahāyānam hyatisṭa=ṭānti, atīta ya saṅ mahādhika, asvagata mahesvara, hulun hadyan kaniṣṭha madhyamvattama, laki vadvan, ya vataṅakәn sādhyanya saṅ hyaṅ hayu, vinarah ya ri guru talapakan rumuhun, apa
dumehnya, maṅkana, guru tan magave durbhaga, yan apa ikā, ya tinutakәn ikaṅ guru talapakan rumuhun, sakābhyāsa praṇamyāsīt, tlas pva kita tumutakәna guru talapakar ri kita, praṇamya yātah sәmbahәn, sәmbahәn, ṅa, pituhun, ka,

lg.l: anāma hīnavākyam ahi, siṁharūpañ ca grahaste,

div.p:
anāma tar kapaṅguh namaniṅ guru, hīnavākyam tan paṅucap saṅ hyaṅ hayu, tar upǝta saṅ matuha, siṁharupañ ca grahaste, katvan ta n pamǝtvakǝn krvadha ri saṅ guru, tar dadi maṅkana, saṅ guru saṁghāsanam pr̥tatәm śumīghraha yar kapapag saṅ guru ri havan, ane kapaṅguh ri svadeśa kunaṅ, sәmbahәn ta saṅ guru, mvaṅ tan agǝlis mavuvus ri saṅ guru, ṅuniveh tan paruhunan laku saṅ guru, tan pavurugan yan padyus, tan anapak maya saṅ guru, tan paṅәmban saṅ guru, tan paṅinum tvak saṅ guru, tan paṅambvan taḍahәn saṅ guru, tar paṅaṅgva agәm-agәman saṅ guru, yar tan kinvan len saṅkarika, tan pabaryan-baryan istri saṅ guru, anak saṅ guru, rāma tuha saṅ guru, pvasi saṅ guru, kapvanakan
saṅ guru, tagvan-tagvanan saṅ guru, tadinan saṅ guru, nahan sinaṅguh guru talapakan ṅaranya, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma.

div.head: The Misfortune of the World (jagat upadrava)
div.p:
nihan ta kapiṅgnәpnya sih saṅ paṇḍita ri saṅ sevaka dharma, ndya ya nihan saṅ hyaṅ jagat upadrava, ṅa, ndya ya nihan hala tumәmu halanya, hayu tumәmu hayunya, vilut tumәmu vilutnya, bnәr tumemu bәnәrnya, sukha tumәmu sukhanya, umapa kari kasukha-duhkhanikaṅ rat kabaih, ya ta kita tan hana vaneh, saṅ hyaṅ trikāya maṇḍala pariśuddha, ka, apan saṅka ri ulah śabda lava
n ambәk sukha riya, sukha-duhkha riya, vruh pva kita saṅkaniṅ śīla mahala, sakarika upadrava, mataṅyan śīla rahayu, ya ta ginavayakna, yatanya tan kopadrava, nahan ta jagat upadrava, ṅa, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma.

div.head: The Four Powers (caduśakti)
div.p:
hana kapiṅpitunya sih saṅ paṇḍita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma, saṅ hyaṅ caduśakti saṅ paṇḍita, ṅa, apa kari mataṅ yan caduśakti, ṅa, pat śakti, ṅa, bisanya, ya ta pinakasañjata saṅ paṇḍita, ndya ya nihan, cakra jalakuna, cakra jalapakṣa, cakra sambharaṇa, cakra ta
raṅgabāhu.

nihan lvirnya, an upadrava saṅ paṇḍita, irikaṅ saṅ mānadhana, umigәl saṅ mānadhana ri tala, jalakuna paṅupadrava saṅ paṇḍita ri vǝkasniṅ patala, di saṅ mānadhana, i svar patniṅ saṅ mānadhana, ri patala, umigәl ta ya ri tasik sumlәm ri pusәran maṅsāgara, ya jalapakṣa paṅupadrava saṅ paṇḍita, irikaṅ samudra, patnikaṅ saṅ mānadhana, saka ri sāgara, umigǝl ta ya ri lvar kidul kulvan vetan, ya cakra sambharaṇa paṅupadrava saṅ paṇḍita, irikaṅ lvar kidul kulvan vetan, umigәl ta ya ri vǝkasniṅ i ruhur, cakra taraṅga
bahu paṅupaḍrava saṅ paṇḍita, ri vkasniṅ i ruhur, syuh gәsǝṅ kapravasa ika vkәsniṅ i ruhur, de sañjata saṅ paṇḍita, i svar i luhur, makuliliṅan.

nihan lvirnya ikaṅ saṅ hyaṅ caduśakti pinakasañjata saṅ paṇḍita, pәpәk pәnuh ikeṅ bhuvana, di deśāntara de saṅjata, kaliṅanya, yatna mvalah, yatna mañabda, yatna māmbǝkan yatanya tar kopadrava, ya ta sinaṅguh saṅ hyaṅ caduśakti, ya vkasnikaṅ saṅ paṇḍita, yatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma.

div.head: Trikāya paśānta
div.p:
ndah nihan arthya yuktiniṅ vuvusaknaṅ vvaṅ kadi kita, vvaṅ tumәkakәn ikaṅ saṅ mahyun vruh hyaṅ
nika gvaravanika, saṅ hyaṅ dharmaviśeṣa, mvaṅ mūla patiniṅ teja samaṅke, mataṅ yan umaṅguhakәn saṅ hyaṅ ratnopadeśa, saka ri hyaṅ matuha, hana saṅ hyaṅ trikāya paśānta, ṅa, ya prihәn kayatnakna tmәn, apan sira mūla hala lavan hayu, sukha-duhkhanikaṅ janma samaṅke, anvan ta kitaṅ vvaṅ pinaten sinәmpal, rinampas dinval ramanya, renanya, sinuvar kadaṅnya, kahava-hava ramanya, ri thāni, apa dumehnya maṅkana, tar prayatnanikaṅ gaveyānikaṅ saṅ hyaṅ trikāya paśānta, ṅa, tar ka
raṇanya, maṅguh ikaṅ pāpa saṅsāra magәṅ ika ta, maṅkana kapva pukulun, kopadrava denika, saṅ hyaṅ trikāya paśānta kapva kaṅ janma mataṅ yan tar pahiṅaniṅ pāpa, paṅupadrava riṅ rat, nyāpan tahan kva liṅanta.

nihan ta kami mavarahakna ri kita, hana ñāna paśānta, karma paśānta, śabda paśānta, ñāna pasanta, ṅa, ambǝk rahayu, tar kira-kira riṅ rat mvaṅ tan padadyakna duhkhaniṅ len, ṅuniveh tan padadyakna harohara ri bhuvana, ya ta sinaṅguh jñāna paśānta, ṅa, karma paśānta, ṅa, ulah yvagya, ulah rahayu ulah yukti, tar
paḍaṇḍakara tan padadyakna pahalaniṅ rat, ya sinaṅguh karma paśānta, ṅa, śabda paśānta, ṅa, śabda rahayu enak karǝṅә deniṅ rat, tan padadyakna pati-duhkhaniṅ len, ṅuniveh riṅ vaknya, ya śabda paśānta, ṅa, tri ṅaraniṅ tәlu, paśānta maṅdadyakәn enak ambǝknikaṅ rat, yar kagәgә denira, tar kopadrava ikaṅ janma vvaṅ yan maṅkana.

ri sdәṅnya ta gәgә halanira, ṅa, ikaṅ trimala, trimala, ṅa, triduṣṭa, nihan lvirnya, ñāna duṣṭa, karma duṣṭa, śabda duṣṭa, ñāna duṣṭa, ṅa, ambǝk kumira-kirakәn ri padanya janma, ṅahanakәn
lan maṅdadyakәn haroharaniṅ bhuvana, ya ta sinaṅguh ñāna duṣṭa, karma duṣṭa, ṅa, ulah tar yvagya ulah mahala, ulah tar yukti, maṅdadyakәn haroharaniṅ bhuvana, ṅuniveh maṅdadyakna duhkha pati ri padanya janma, ndah lvirnya, amaliṅ anumpu, aṅracun aṅabhicāri, mahabәt, anurāga, mraṅ vvaṅ tan paḍvasa, savetniṅ harǝpnya drabya sukha, ya sinaṅguh karma duṣṭa, [śabda dusta] ṅa, śabda tar penak karǝṅә, maṅdadyakna durbala, ri padanya janma, lvirnya, amisuh akimburu, anaṅguh naraka, īrṣya ri padanya janma, a
naṅguh nəluh tar nәluh anaṅguh maliṅ tar maliṅ, anaṅguh musuh tar musuh anaṅguh duṣṭa di saṅ sādhu, vak capala vak paruṣa, ya sinaṅguh śabda duṣṭa, ṅa, ya sinaṅguh trimala, ṅa, ñana duṣṭa pva pinakāmbәkniṅ vvaṅ, karma duṣṭa pva pinakolahniṅ vvaṅ, śabda duṣṭa pva pinakaśabdaniṅ vvaṅ, byakta katәmpuhaniṅ jagat upadrava.

mapa saṅ upadrava ṅaranya, lvirnya, kady aṅganiṅ vuta tuli, vuḍug vikәt kәkәṅ, vuṅkuk, sәkәl vuta salaya, salvir vikāraniṅ avak rūpanya, ṅuniveh taṅ kǝrǝṅan, sakvehniṅ virūpa, ya pāpa, ṅa, mana pā
pa ginavayakәnya taṅ ñāna duṣṭa, karma duṣṭa, śabda duṣṭa, kady aṅganiṅ maliṅ, ṅahabәt, ṅaracun, anәluh, ika ginavayakәnya, mati pva kita tәmahan tәtәk ulǝr, vǝḍit, lintah, lakay hiris pvah, lakay әlur, salvirniṅ janma kinaririsan, ya sinaṅguh pāpa, tipniṅ kavah, ṅa, ya salaha, ilagana tǝmәn teka saṅ paṇḍita, saparanya gavayakna.

Om saṅ hyaṅ trikāyopaśānta atah ika sabhyāsanta, mvaṅ lagi-laginta, apan maṅke hәlǝm-hǝlәmniṅ ahǝlәm, saṅ hyaṅ trikayopaśānta atah ika gәgәnta
, ya ta pinakaparahu, pinakabahitra, pinakabanava, makaparahu ñāna paśānta, makabanava karma paśānta, makabahitra śabda paśānta, sira ta saṅ sadhu jati ṅaranira, sira saṅ yogīśvara ṅaranira, sira saṅ paṇḍita, saṅ viku ṅaranira, mapa ruktinika, livat ta ya pinakapariṇāma de saṅ paṇḍita.

div.head: Daśakleśa
div.p: ndah nihan yuktinya,

kaliṅanya vǝnaṅa ta śumuddhakәn taṅ daśakleśa, yar dataṅ ri kita, nyaṅ doṣa, moha, drәmba, lobha, mātsarya, abhimāna, mūrkha
, kuhaka, sambhinnapralāpa, peśuna,

ka, ḍosa, ṅa, puji-puji sukha, puji-puji vihikan, puji-puji vīrya, ya sinaṅguḥ doṣa, ṅa, moha ṅaranya, tan pagavaya sih ri paḍanya janma, jǝnәkiṅ paṅan inum bvat turu, tan akiṅkin hitāvasānaniṅ janma, ya drәmba, ṅa, lobha ṅaranya, kveh ulah tar sopacara, mātsarya, ṅa, timburu manon rahayu, abhimāna, ṅa, barya tamtam, mūrkha, ṅa, tar kolih ri viśeṣaniṅ janma, kuhaka, ṅa, aṅaku-akuniṅ aguṇa, sambhinnapralāpa, ṅa, aṅayam-ayam dr̥byaniṅ adr̥bya, mvaṅ śukhaniṅ asukha, pe
śuna, ṅa, bvat maṅjәrum, ya ta sinaṅguh daśakleśa, ṅa, babadan hilaṅakna, ikaṅ kleśa maṅkana.

div.head: Daśamala
div.p: vigataḥ sarvaduhkhinaḥ, vǝnaṅa kari kita sami bataṅ mārakarma, yar dataṅ ri kita, mārakarma, ṅa, supta, bhaya, tandrī, kleda, lajjā, rāgastrī, paradāra, bhakṣabhojana, kuṭilaviveka, mǝta,

ka, supta, ṅa, bvat turu, katuron tumakonakna kaṅ hayu, mvaṅ viśeṣaniṅ janmanya, katuron ta maṅgavayakna enak ambǝk, mvaṅ mujarakna hayu ri paḍanya janma, bhaya ṅaranya, vǝdi-vǝdi tumakonakǝn hitāvasānaniṅ janma, vǝdi sevaka ri tuha
nya, vǝdi ri ujar rahayu, tandrī, ṅa, luhya tumakonakna puṅguṅnya, luhya gumavay enak ambǝk, mvaṅ mujarakna hayu, ya tandrī, ṅa, kleda, ṅa, jrih gumavayakna enak ambәk, jrih tumakonakna hitāvasānaniṅ janma, lajjā ṅa, eraṅ-eraṅ tumakonakna kapuṅguṅnya, eraṅ sevaka ri tuhanya, eraṅ sevaka deniṅ sukhanya, rāgastrī, ṅa, viṣaya harǝp maṅrabi, mvaṅ harǝp sukha, paradāra, ṅa, ṅalap estri laraṅan, bhakṣabhojana, ṅa, dr̥pta maṅanuṅgalakәn kinabelan, kuṭila viveka, ṅa,
hǝlәm gumavayakna inak ambәk mvaṅ mujarakna hayu ri paḍanya janma, mәta, ṅa, avәrǝ deniṅ sukhanya, avәrǝ deniṅ prajñānya, avәrǝ deniṅ paṅavruhnya, averǝ deniṅ guṇanya, ya mәta, ṅa, babadan hilaṅakna ikaṅ ambǝk yan maṅkana denta.

div.head: Daśapaśānta
div.p:
kurvanti katayan dharma, gavayakna sakagavayan saṅ hyaṅ dharma, lvirnya ta nihan, dāna, śīla, kṣānti, vīrya, dhyāna, prajñā, karuṇā, mudita, metrī, upekṣā, ka, dāna ṅaranya, mere enak ambǝk di paḍanya janma, śīla, ṅa, vihikan aṅalap kasor, kṣānti, ṅa, vi
hikan anupakṣama, vīrya, ṅa, utsāha ri kagavayaniṅ hayu, tambәhana hayunya muvah, dhyāna, ṅa, umiṅәtakәn arthaniṅ paramārtha, prajñā, ṅa, utsāha ri kahilaṅaniṅ daśakleśa ri śarīranya, karuṇā, ṅa, larāmbǝknyāmaṅguhakәn duhkhaniṅ len, mudita, ṅa, tar kepvan masukhaniṅ len, metrī, ṅa, vruh gumavayakna mimitiniṅ dadi inak ambhәknikaṅ len, upekṣā, ṅa, tar grah iri hala hayu.

div.head: Daśabhūmi
div.p:
kurvanti kuśalam mahat, gavayakna kaṅ kuśala viśeṣa, kuśala viśeṣa, ṅa, asih bhakti prayatna, gorava duga-du
ga, śānta karuṇa ika, anumāna, anumoda, ālambana atvaṅ, ya sinaṅguh daśabhūmi, ṅa, abhyāsa lagi-lagi saṅ paṇḍita, ikaṅ ambәk maṅkana.

div.head: The Origins of Sorrow
div.p: ndah nihan kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma, marapvan tar knaniṅ upadrava jagat gatisaṅsāra, hana paśānta, śabda paśānta, ulah paśānta, ambǝk paśānta, ya rakṣa pahayu juga, marapvan tar kna saṅka ri duhkha, kaliṅanya, duhkha saṅka ri bhuta, duhkha saṅka ri devata, duhkha saṅka ri śarīra.

ka, yan kita kәna ku na upadrava, ku na pañcamahabuta, pati disantok oray, dipanah gәlap, disaṅgu
t buhaya, katiṅgaṅ paṅpuṅ, dirontok mauṅ, pati dipraṅ, dihadaṅ, dipuak, pati labuh ti na luhur kai, ditumpu, pati dikәndat, sakvehniṅ bajra pati di praṅan, ya duka saṅka ri buta, ṅa, ya duka saṅka ri devata ma, ṅa, tajam sǝkǝt, nirisan, riәt hulu, sakit mata, jaroṅәn, sumbilaṅәn, buyan, mәdu, panas tiris, larahati, ya duka saṅka ri deva, ṅa, ya duka saṅka riṅ sarira ma pecak, beṅo, buntuṅ, buta tuli, beaṅ, rumpuṅ tugәl, ya duka sarira, ṅa, ya duka ku na tribvana ma, ṅa, hulun, pahuma,
pañadap, pañavah, mava taṅan, dipisuku, dipitaṅan, mo visesa di huripnya, di bǝnaṅnya, di gunanya, ya duka ku na tribvana, ṅa, ya duka ku na bvanaloka ma, ṅa, kahuruan dayәh, buruṅ tahun, eleh dayәh, eleh ku sasalad, laru salah masa, sarba satva ñarak, sarba pala tan pavvaḥ, ya duka saṅka ri bvanaloka, ṅa.

mana duka ku ulahta, ku sabdata, ku ambǝkta, ṅahanakәn ulah dusta, sabda dusta, ambǝk dusta, mapa ta kaliṅaniṅ sabda dusta, ñumpah-madahkәn, ṅajap, ṅapus, mariṅkavut, ṅadu
duh, nәluh, ṅupat, naruh, campәlak sabda, gasoṅ tan pakarana, ya sabda dusta, ṅa, ulah dusta, ṅa, nampar, mǝrǝp, ṅadәdәl, nǝvәk, mokol, sakvehniṅ lǝkas taṅan, ya ulah dusta, ṅa, ambǝk dusta, ṅa, ṅaracun, mijahәtan, hiri payogya, di padanya janma, ya ambәk dusta, ṅa, ya saṅkaniṅ duka ku ulahta, ku sabdata, ku ambәkta.

kita yan avǝdi ri upadrava, ulahakәn śabda paśānta, ṅa, ulah paśānta, ambәk paśānta, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma, marapvan tar vinigraha, śabda paśānta, ṅa, śabda menak, śabda rahayu, śabda
manohara, śabda madhura, śabda manis arum, ya śabda paśānta, ṅa, ulah paśānta, ṅa, ulah menak, ulah rahayu, hayva palar cidra, hayva sraṅ ulah hala hayu, taṅan masaṅguli, matalaṅkup, yan paṅucap lavan vvaṅ atuha, ya ulah paśānta, ṅa, ambak paśānta, ṅa, hayva daṇḍakara, hiri payvagya, ri paḍanya janma, hayva jahәt ambәk, ṅahanakәn ambǝk menak, ambǝk heraṅ, ambek rahayu, ya ambǝk paśānta, ṅa, ya karasa ikaṅ paśānta, kahanakәn sakāya-kāyeka dharma, ya tar karasa i
rikaṅ paśānta, ambǝk duṣṭa maṅkana, nihan śikṣā saṅ paṇḍita, śikṣā guru, ṅa, ya ta mataṅyan kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma,

list.item: L 642: iti siksa guru, ṅa, lamun vruh di vvitniṅ bǝnәr tar kǝna ku upaḍrava, lamun tar vruh di vvitniṅ bǝnәr, kәna ku na upadrava, nihan kavuvusan siksa guru, ṅa, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma
